title: Add state for "scrolling to bottom"
author: Greg-Freeman

comments.body:
I agree, we have this information in the state object but I thought to hide it as an implementation detail.

I've just published 1.0.46 which adds the `state` object to the return of the `useStickToBottom()` hook and the `StickToBottom` context provider.

You can read `state.animation` to get the current playing animation, or it'll be `undefined` if none is happening

title: Request for use-stick-to-bottom Support for React 19.0.0
body:
Hi @samdenty,

Could you please update `use-stick-to-bottom` to support React 19.0.0? The current version 1.0.42 doesn't meet the peer dependency requirement for this React version.

Thanks!
author: RostyslavManko

comments.body: 19.0.0 added in 1.0.43, thanks for bringing up! have a good new year!

title: Option to stop autoscrolling when streamed response is at top of scroll container
body:
While I was implementing my own custom autoscrolling solution, I found this package (thank you so much for making it by the way).

I was wondering if there's a way to currently or add the option to stop autoscrolling when the streamed response reaches the top of scroll container.
